name: BE.2.5.1- Evaluate strategic options and measures to liberalize sectors and encourage competition
BE.1.1.4- Strengthen portfolio of regulatory and financial incentives to attract foreign direct investment as part of a comprehensive FDI policy

IE.2.1.1- Define the long-term roles of government especially differentiating between its regulatory and operational roles across sectors, and plan the transition to benefit from privatization and PPP
BE.1.4.5- Design and rollout policy-making function in MOCI focusing on business regulatory environment; consider 'better regulation' offices across priority sectors
BE.1.4.6- (Re-)design policy-making processes and governance to expedite business-related policy and law reforms in a proactive manner
BE.1.1.7- Design new governance and operating model to support decision-making by senior Government leaders on strategically important / large scale FDI
